channel.title: LAL on Dawg & Hen
channel.description: Recent content in LAL on Dawg & Hen

item.title: OffRtg for a small line-up with the center, Lebron James
item.description: When the Clippers did beat the Lakers' small line-up put LeBron James at the center postion in the 4th quarter. Many including LeBron himself criticized the bad defense LeBron says he knew he wouldn't have what he needed tonight after four straight days off. Emphasized that in the lineup with him and Melo at the 4 and 5, he was "pretty shitty" on the defensive end. But says that he was just grateful to be out there.
